short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you play contexto with the twitch chat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to play on https://contexto.me/ with the twitch chat

After you install this extension, you will have a new button on the top left.
This button toggles into streamer mode.
If you hover this button you will see a couple of other options:
 - Login with Twitch: this is required inorder to read the chat.
 - Set prefix: if you want to set a command instead of just running it.
 - Toggle names: this will hide/show the names of the guessers.

After you log in, every time someone type a word in your twitch chat, it will put it in contexto.

Have fun!
